Module org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker
Package org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.data

Class QuestionDAO

java.lang.Object
org.ntnu.k2.g2.quizmaker.data.QuestionDAO
class QuestionDAO extends Object
A class that deals with the "questions"-table in the database. Instances of this class can be used to save and retrieve data from the database. This method is package-protected. Database interactions should be done using the QuizRegister class.

  • Method Details

    • getQuestionById

      public static QuestionModel getQuestionById(int id)
      Gets a question form the database based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the question.
      Returns:
      The question with this ID. If there is no question that matches the ID, a null pointer is returned.

    • getQuestionsByQuizId

      public static HashMap<Integer,QuestionModel> getQuestionsByQuizId(int quizId)

    • getQuizIdByQuestionId

      public static int getQuizIdByQuestionId(int questionId)
      Gets the id of a quiz that contains a question with the supplied id.
      Parameters:
      questionId - The id of the question.
      Returns:
      The quiz id of the quiz where the question is a component. Returns -1 if the questionId is not found.

    • updateQuestion

      public static QuestionModel updateQuestion(QuestionModel question, int quizId)
      Saves a question to the database.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to save to the database.
      quizId - The id of the quiz this question is part of.
      Returns:
      The question as it is now saved in the database.

    • updateQuestion

      public static QuestionModel updateQuestion(QuestionModel question)
      Updates the question is the database by finding its quiz id implicitly.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to update in the database
      Returns:
      The question as it is now saved in the database.

    • removeQuestionById

      public static boolean removeQuestionById(int id)
      Removes a question with the given id from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the question.
      Returns:
      True if the question was removed successfully, false if not.
